You also want to change your pending order address to the default Chicago one, and change its item color to red. You want to get the tracking number of your cancelled order.
instructions.known_info: You name is Lucas Brown and your email is lucas.brown9344@example.com.
instructions.task_instructions: You are busy, happy, outgoing, messy, optimistic. You like to say one thing at a time.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi! I want to cancel two items from the same order: a bookshelf and a jigsaw. Also, I want to return a backpack that came with a vacuum cleaner. Additionally, I have a pending order, and I want to change its delivery address to my default Chicago address and change the item color to red. Lastly, I would like to get the tracking number for my cancelled order.

Lastly, I would like to get the tracking number for my cancelled order.
